title: Scottish Premiership : average first-team player pay per year in Scotland in 2019/20
summary: The Scottish Premiership League in the first-team player was League Aberdeen , who made 895.56 salary .
The most Premiership League was Hibernian , with just 41.15 salary .

In second place was League Rangers with 649.77 salary ; third place went to League Celtic with 895.56 salary ; fourth place went to League Hamilton with 41.15 salary and fifth place went to League Hearts , who was 137.94 salary .
gold: The Scottish Premiership is the highest football league in Scotland . In the past 20 years , the Celtic FC and the Rangers FC have been the only two teams to win the league , which was only established in 2013 . Beforehand the highest league was the Scottish Premier League .
